name: Temple Hunter (marcoact)
description:
For many years, several temple hunters have tried to conquer this lost temple, all of them losing their lives, including Richard's ancestors.

   Enter the character of Tom Richard and come after the conquest of the lost treasure, which is found in the last room of the temple. But to get there you'll have to kill all the monsters and go through all the traps that will be waiting. I challenge you to try your luck and find a lost key. Are you up to the challenge?

Commands: Button Function WWalk forward AWalk to the left DWalk to the right SWalk backwards Left mouse button
Attack SpacebarJump EUse/Interact with the map ESCOpen the Menu 1Sword combat mode 2
Fighting mode fists
W + ShiftLeftRunCTRL-LeftSquat Camera rotation with the mouse Hardware Requirements:
  • SO: Windows 7+/High Sierra 10.13+/Ubuntu 18.04+
  • CPU: Intel core i5 +/AMD Ryzen 5 +
  • RAM: 8GB +
  • Hard drive free space: Entre 50MB e 150MB
  • GPU: GeForce GT 630/640M + or AMD Radeon HD 7450 +
  • Internet: optional
Install Instructions
  • Download the file 
  • Unzip it
  • Launch "TempleHunter.exe"
  • Enjoy
